The Aristotle Metadata API provides direct access to metadata using a versioned REST API.

The following versions of the API are available on this server:

  • API v3

    About Version 3:

    • replaced database identifiers with UUIDs as the primary method for identifiying metadata.
    • Added the /about/ route to give basic public details about the registry

    View the schema for the v3 endpoint
  • API v2

    View the schema for the v2 endpoint
